history.proof: intros l1 l2 H. induction l1 as [|e1 l1' IH]. - simpl. sfirstorder depth: 3. - hfcrush use: sorted_cons, in_or_app unfold: sorted, app.

exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros l1 l2 H. induction l1 as [|e1 l1' IH]. - simpl. intros. apply H. - simpl. intros H'. apply IH. + simpl in H. destruct H as [H1 H2]. apply H1. + simpl in H. destruct H as [H1 H2]. apply H.
